copy.instruction0: To light up a firefly, first click on a glowing dot of light to fill your basket.
copy.instruction1: Click again near a firefly to release the light. Light up more than one firefly at a time to earn more points!
copy.instruction2: Watch out for pesky moths. They love sparkly stuff! They'll knock your light-filled basket right out of your hands!
copy.instruction3: If you run out of baskets, your game is over.
copy.title: Firefly Light-Up
copy.add_basket: PERFECT! You get an extra basket!
copy.host_bubble_1B: Fill your basket with light, then put it on a firefly!
copy.host_bubble_2B: Use the light when both fireflies are right next to you!
copy.tutorial_stepIntro: Welcome to Twilight Glen! Come on, I'll show you how to light up the fireflies!
copy.tutorial_step1: First, fill your basket with a glowing light by picking up a light dot.
copy.tutorial_step2: Then put the light on the firefly.
copy.tutorial_step3: Your turn. Go ahead and light up a firefly!
copy.tutorial_step4: Flickerific job! Watch out for those pesky moths. You'll lose a basket if you run into them!
copy.tutorial_step5: This shows you how many baskets you have left. The game ends if you run out of baskets.
copy.tutorial_step6: And this shows you how many fireflies you need to light up to finish. Don't worry, I'll be here with you!
copy.tutorial_step7: Now check this out -- you can light up more than one firefly at a time!
copy.easy_story: It's firefly lighting time! Let's get going!
copy.medium_story: There are lots more fireflies to light up. Are you ready?
copy.hard_story: Here come more fireflies. It's time to get your glow on!
copy.royal_story: These fireflies aren't easy to light up, but they glow so brightly! I can't wait to see them shine!
copy.medium_exitstory: Thanks to you, the fireflies are glowing with happiness. You're the best!
copy.hard_exitstory: Thanks for helping, sunshine. I've never seen brighter fireflies!
copy.royal_exitstory: We did it! SHIMMERIFIC! I couldn't have done it without you, sunshine. Thanks!
copy.allmedium_story: Flickerific job, sunshine! But there are more fireflies waiting. We need to keep going!
copy.allhard_story: Flashtastic! There are more still to light up -- don't stop now!
copy.allroyal_story: Shimmering sunbeams, so many fireflies still need to be lit! Come on!
copy.level_tip_basket: Hi there, moonbeam! Welcome to Twilight Glen! I need your help to light up fireflies. I'll make dots of light, then you gather them up and put them onto fireflies! Get ready!
copy.level_tip_blue: Blue moonlight gives a big burst when you release it!
copy.level_tip_moth: Those silly moths will knock down your basket if you're carrying a dot of light, so be careful!
copy.level_tip_red: Red firelight spreads from firefly to firefly.
copy.level_tip_purple: Purple twilight lingers for a little bit, lighting every firefly that passes through it.
copy.level_tip_green: The green moth light isn't for fireflies -- it attracts moths and keeps them busy for a little while.
copy.level_tip_orange: Orange sunlight draws fireflies toward it and then expands to light them up!
copy.level_tip_chase: Really watch those yellow moths! They'll chase you if you have a dot of light in your basket!
copy.host_game_win_0: Moon and stars, you really got those fireflies glowing! Thanks!
copy.host_game_win_1: That's what I call a stellar job! Thanks so much for your help!
copy.host_game_win_2: Wiggle my wingtips, I couldn't have done it without you! Thanks!
copy.host_game_win_3: Wow, you did so well I think the fireflies took a shine to you! Thanks for the help!
copy.host_game_win_4: I don't think I've ever seen Twilight Glen sparkle so much. Thanks for helping me!
copy.host_game_fail_0: Looks like you ran out of baskets. That's ok- thanks for all your help so far!
copy.host_game_fail_1: Lighting those little guys isn't easy, huh? It takes practice, so come back any time and try again!
copy.host_game_fail_2: Oops! That was your last basket. Well, don't worry you can try again whenever you want!
copy.host_level_1_0: Here's an easy one for starters.
copy.host_level_2_0: Now try to get both those fireflies!
copy.host_level_2_1: See if you can light both of them at once!
copy.host_level_3_1: Lighting fireflies takes a lot of patience!
copy.host_level_4_0: Whoa, look out for that moth!
copy.host_level_5_1: You'll have to be quick to light them all at once!
copy.host_level_6_0: See if you can slip past those moths!
copy.host_level_6_1: These fireflies are showing off their fancy flying!
copy.host_level_7_0: Try the blue moonlight for a big surprise!
copy.host_level_7_1: The light of a blue moon gives off a super glow!
copy.host_level_8_0: Remember to use your blue moonlight at the right moment!
copy.host_level_8_1: Remember to keep your light away from that moth!
copy.host_level_9_0: Try out the red firelight and watch it spread!
copy.host_level_9_1: Give the red light a try!
copy.host_level_10_1: Use your red firelight to light the fireflies in a row!
copy.host_level_11_0: I just love the red light, don't you?
copy.host_level_11_1: These fireflies are really flapping, aren't they?
copy.host_level_12_0: Try putting your purple twilight right in the center!
copy.host_level_13_0: Can you figure out how to light all these fireflies at once?
copy.host_level_13_1: Use your purple twilight and yellow moonlight together!
copy.host_level_14_0: Remember, your green light will distract those moths!
copy.host_level_14_1: Be sure to lure those moths far away!
copy.host_level_15_1: Ooo purple, green, and yellow light all at once!
copy.host_level_16_0: Watch out! One of those moths is not like the others!
copy.host_level_16_1: Those yellow moths can really get in the way. Be careful!
copy.host_level_17_0: This one is all about timing!
copy.host_level_17_1: You'll have to fly quickly here!
copy.host_level_18_0: Try to spread that red firelight all around!
copy.host_level_19_0: Hmm, can you slip past those moths?
copy.host_level_19_1: Watch out for that ring of moths!
copy.host_level_20_0: Do you think you can light all these fireflies at once?
copy.host_level_21_0: You should be able to get both those fireflies at once!
copy.host_level_22_0: Hmm, I wonder where you should use that purple light?
copy.host_level_23_0: Watch out for those chasing moths!
copy.host_level_24_0: Look at all those fireflies in a row!
copy.host_level_24_1: This shouldn't be too hard if you use your purple twilight.
copy.host_level_25_0: Looks like those moths really like the lights!
copy.host_level_26_0: Fireflies are really drawn to orange sunlight!
copy.host_level_27_0: See if you can lure those fireflies away from those moths!
copy.host_level_28_0: Try using sunlight and moonlight together!
copy.host_level_30_0: This is tricky. Can you see where to use the red light?
copy.host_level_30_1: Do you think you could light them all in a single shot?
copy.host_level_31_0: Look out! There's a lot of moths here that will chase you.
copy.host_level_32_0: Sometimes even fireflies can be tricky!
copy.host_level_33_0: I think a well placed red light could light all these guys.
copy.host_level_34_0: Hmm, I wonder where those moths got to?
copy.host_level_35_0: Hmm, how can you get that green moth light?
copy.host_level_36_0: I think a well-placed red light could light all these guys.
copy.host_level_36_1: Be careful of those pesky moths!
copy.host_level_38_0: I think you know what to do here.
copy.host_level_41_0: You've got to be fast here!
copy.host_level_42_0: This one is sure to have you spinning in circles!
copy.host_level_43_0: Look at all the colors of light!
copy.host_level_44_0: With all those lights, you're sure to think of something!
copy.host_level_45_0: These fireflies are a bit shy, aren't they?
copy.host_level_46_0: Wow- I've rarely seen so many lights!
copy.host_level_47_0: Watch out for all those pesky moths!
copy.host_level_48_0: If you're clever, you might be able to light them all at once!
copy.host_level_49_0: Don't be scared by those moths!
copy.host_level_50_0: Just one little guy left! Light him up!
copy.host_combo_1_1: Now that's what I call a sparkle-rific firefly!
copy.host_combo_2_0: Two at once- way to go!
copy.host_combo_2_1: Two fireflies are better than one!
copy.host_combo_2_2: Wow, two fireflies in a single shot!
copy.host_combo_4_1: Hooray, four different fireflies with one light!
copy.host_combo_4_2: Great job lighting all four of those fireflies!
copy.host_combo_many_0: You've got a real flare for this!
copy.host_combo_many_1: Look at all those glowing fireflies!
copy.host_combo_many_3: You've made these fireflies so happy!
copy.host_combo_many_4: Those fireflies look as sparkly as a smile!
copy.host_combo_many_6: Ah, what a pretty glow you're spreading!
copy.host_combo_all_0: The night sky is lit up because of you!
copy.host_combo_all_2: Oh, I'm so proud of you!
copy.host_combo_all_3: Are we a good team or what?
copy.host_combo_all_4: Pixie Hollow's really going to glow now!
copy.host_moth_1: Oh no! Those moths are so sneaky!
copy.host_moth_3: Watch out! Those moths are fast.
copy.host_moth_4: Oh, that's ok. Let's try again!
